participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Emma is hardworking and dedicated, with a passion for nature and animals. She enjoys the simple pleasures of life and is very down-to-earth.
participant_1.background: i like to ride horses. i help tend the fields. i like to listen to rock music while working. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: David is friendly and approachable, with a nurturing side as he cares for his stepchildren. He is adaptable and enjoys new experiences.
participant_2.background: i work at a school. a already have a step children. i just moved into my first home. i recently moved to this country.
